text:
I have a statement something like this:
<fixcrlf srcdir="${basedir}/deploy/help/whgdata" 
 eol="lf" 
 includes="*.htm"/>

If the file includes a long line (like 11,000 characters) the following 
exception is thrown:
java.io.IOException: Mark invalid

I was able to reproduce the problem by creating a file with one line of 11,000 
x's.
